mapper.select: SELECT bookIdx,bookISBN,bookName,bookStock,bookStatus FROM lpjt_book WHERE lpjt_book.bookidx NOT IN (SELECT lpjt_relationpublisher.bookIdx FROM lpjt_relationpublisher)
SELECT bookIdx,bookISBN,bookName,bookStock,bookStatus FROM lpjt_book WHERE lpjt_book.bookidx NOT IN (SELECT lpjt_relationcategory.bookIdx FROM lpjt_relationcategory)

SELECT *,lpjt_relationcategory.categoryIdx,lpjt_relationpublisher.publisherIdx FROM lpjt_book,lpjt_relationpublisher,lpjt_relationcategory WHERE lpjt_book.bookIdx = lpjt_relationpublisher.bookIdx AND lpjt_book.bookIdx = lpjt_relationcategory.bookIdx AND lpjt_book.bookIdx = #{idx}
